name: Isolation (itch) (We Are Not Spies)
description:
Isolation
This game was made for Chip 'n' jam Autumn 2020. The theme was "Don't lose the faith" and the focus was powerups. To achieve the theme, the height the player is at during the game represents their faith in humanity.

Click and drag LMB to move, this can be done while grounded or once while in the air. Scroll wheel zooms map in and out.
Escape to quit, R to restart.

Credits:
Made by Robert "Some Buckets" Mason
Pain sound: Wojtek "No Buckets" Rak
Splat sound:  Brevicepts (Freesound.org)
Music: Dark Fantasy Studio - Stay (License from Humble Bundle
